text: Debut is an album by Björk. It was released in 1993. It has sold 4.7 million copies around the world. Five singles were released from it. These were "Human Behaviour", "Venus as a Boy", "Play Dead", "Big Time Sensuality" and "Violently Happy". Most of the reviews of Debut said that it is a good album. The video for "Human Behaviour" was nominated for Best Short Form Music Video at the 1994 Grammy Awards. ==Track listing== # "Human Behaviour" (Björk, Nellee Hooper) – 4:10 # "Crying" (Björk, Hooper) – 4:52 # "Venus as a Boy" – 4:42 # "There's More to Life Than This" (Björk, Hooper) – 3:21 # "Like Someone in Love" (Johnny Burke, James Van Heusen) – 4:33 # "Big Time Sensuality" (Björk, Hooper) – 3:57 # "One Day" – 5:24 # "Aeroplane" – 3:54 # "Come to Me" – 4:55 # "Violently Happy" (Björk, Hooper) – 4:59 # "The Anchor Song" – 3:32 Category:1993 albums Category:Björk albums Category:Debut albums Category:Dance albums
title: Debut (Björk album)
